description:
Try Rapido (रैपिडो), India’s first and largest Bike-Taxi Service. Our bike rides help you cut through traffic, reach on time, and save money. We also have autos and cabs for you. With Rapido, you get a low-price, comfortable and quick auto, bike and cab ride every single time. 

With a presence in 500+ cities and over 75+ million customers have done billions of rides on  Rapido Bike Taxi, Auto & Cabs,. The app has over 75+ million happy customers who prefer Rapido Autos, Bike and Cab rides for intra-city and last-mile commutes. We have a fleet of over 1 million Captains (Bike-Taxi riders, Auto and Cab drivers), with rides available in Metros, Tier-1, Tier-2, and Tier-3 cities, soon launching in other parts of the country too. Since its inception, Rapido has stood by its promise of giving low-price, comfortable and quick auto, bike and cab rides to all its users.

Whether it’s a hectic Monday morning or a relaxed weekend outing, Rapido offers affordable and quick auto, bike, and cab rides. Even during peak traffic, Rapido’s seamless doorstep pick-ups ensure that you reach your destination quick and easily. Apart from being low-priced, you also get exciting offers on auto, bike, and cab rides on Rapido. So, the next time you’re stepping out, get a quick bike ride with Rapido and leave the traffic behind. If a couple of you are stepping out, book a comfortable and affordable Rapido auto or a Rapido cab.
No more waiting and adjusting to shared rides and crowded buses! Whether you’re going to or from the metro, choose a Rapido auto or bike ride to travel comfortably and quickly. 

Download the Rapido App and get Auto, Bike or Cab ride in 5 min at  unbeatable  prices.

We prioritise your safety!
Every Rapido auto, bike or cab ride is insured with Acko Insurance without any extra cost. We ensure our captains abide by all traffic rules during an auto, a bike or a cab ride. Our Bike-Taxis also prioritise every pillion rider’s safety by providing a helmet for each bike ride. Rapido offers you an affordable, quick, and comfortable auto, bike or cab ride by taking care of all the safety concerns.

Easy to Use Rapido App
The Rapido app offers a simplified approach to booking an auto, a bike or a cab ride. Now, you don’t have to worry about remembering a different OTP for every single ride. You get a unique PIN that remains the same every time you book an auto, a bike or a cab ride!

Vernacular app – Available in English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Kannada.
One-click login – Seamless registration and onboarding.
Favourites – Save frequently visited locations for easier access.
Live tracking – Follow the real-time location of the ride.

Cashless and Safe Payment Methods
Whether you’re taking an auto, a bike ride or a cab ride, Rapido encourages you to go digital. It provides cashless payment options such as PayTM, UPI, and Rapido Wallet.

app_name: Where is My Train - by Google
description:
Where is My Train - by Google

Track trains. Stay connected with friends & family. No ads.
Get accurate, real-time train status for Indian Railways and share your train’s live location with friends and family.

Fast. Lightweight. Built for India.
Works offline to save battery and data.
Access full timetables and live status without internet.
Small app size, big features.

Smart search that just works
Find trains by name, number, or route - even with typos.
Get helpful suggestions to plan your journey better.

Disclaimer: Privately maintained; not affiliated with Indian Railways.

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

app_name: Ola: Book Cab, Auto, Bike Taxi
description:
Get a fast & affordable taxi ride with the Ola app, that too with just a few taps on your phone! From Ola Bike Taxis to Ola Autos to Ola Outstation rides, get it all on the Ola Cabs app. With vehicles in more than 200 cities across India including Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Kolkata, and Pune, Ola Cabs is the most popular ride-hailing service in the entire country. The Ola app does more than just book rides. Not only can you send parcels within city limits with Ola Parcel, you can also get your favourite meal delivered to you! So what are you waiting for? Download the Ola app, complete our quick sign-up process and make your first taxi booking!
You can choose from our multiple travel options based on your convenience: Ola Bike Taxi, Ola Auto, Ola Mini, Ola Prime Sedan, Ola Prime Plus, Ola Outstation, Ola Rentals and many more. All Ola Cabs come equipped with onboard GPS for route navigation. 

Services available on the Ola Cabs app:
• Ola Bike Taxi
In a hurry or on a budget? Zip through traffic in an affordable Ola Bike Taxi. 
• Ola Auto
Tired of haggling and waiting for Autos? Make an Ola Auto booking now and get a ride at your doorstep.
• Ola Mini
From quick chores to long trips on the road, Ola Mini is the comfy and economical option you’re looking for!
• Ola Prime Sedan
Looking for a spacious ride and best-in-class experience? Relax in an Ola Prime Sedan! 
• Ola Prime Plus 
Ride in utmost comfort with Ola Prime Plus. Enjoy sedans, top driver-partners, the fastest allotment and no cancellation worries. 
• Ola Prime SUV
Supersized rides when you need more seats & comfort. Extra legroom and boot space for everyone.
• Ola Rentals
Perfect for those who want to rent a cab for a few hours. Got a day full of chores? Make multiple stops with Ola Rentals.
• Ola Outstation
Looking for an intercity cab? Why drive? Our Outstation taxis will get you to your destination comfortably.
• Ola Parcel
Need to send or receive packages within city limits? No need for a separate parcel delivery app. Book an Ola Parcel and get the job done at the lowest price.
• Food Delivery
Are you a foodie at heart? Get your favourite meals delivered home through the Ola app! Say hello to unlimited choices, affordable prices!

How to make a taxi booking on the Ola app:
• Set your pickup location (E.g. Home, Office, etc.)
• Enter your destination
• Choose from multiple payment options including Cash, Ola Money Wallet, PhonePe Wallet, Amazon Pay Wallet, UPI, Credit/Debit Card
• Book the ride option that suits you best
• Track your ride in real time

More benefits of taxi bookings with Ola Cabs:
• Secure OTP: Stay safe from the start with a secure one-time password for every cab ride.
• Schedule a ride: Choose ‘Schedule Ride’ to book a cab ride in advance from anywhere.
• SOS Safety Feature: Ola provides an Emergency call option immediately after the ride is confirmed. You can press the emergency button and get connected to the Safety Response team instantly.
• Emergency Contacts: You can add up to 5 emergency contacts & share the ride tracking link and driver details with them via SMS.
• Comfortable Corporate rides: Make business travel safer and simpler by tagging your work-related trips as Ola Corporate cab rides.

Got questions about the Ola app? Visit the Ola Cabs support website (https://help.olacabs.com/support/home) for more information or write to us at support@olacabs.com.

Stay up-to-date on all our exciting offers and latest happenings by connecting with us online.
• Follow us on Twitter - twitter.com/Olacabs
• Like our Facebook page - facebook.com/Olacabs
• Follow us on Instagram - instagram.com/olacabs

Porter is a leading Goods Transport Service Provider offering a wide range of intra-city and inter-city logistics solutions. With Porter, you can deliver goods at the earliest and most convenient way possible. With its vast operations in 22 Indian cities, including cities like Mumbai, Delhi, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Ahmedabad, Pune, Surat, Jaipur and Kolkata, Porter makes transportation of goods easy. 

Looking for on-demand goods transportation services for business or personal needs? Transport your goods and consignments via a mini-truck, tempo or two-wheeler.

Reliable moving of your goods is now just a click away. Download Porter now!

In its 10 years of operation, Porter has transformed logistics, handling everything from small items (e.g., a pin) to large moves (e.g., relocating a penthouse). Key offerings include:

- On-Demand Intra-city Goods Transportation Services via Trucks and Two-Wheelers : From bulky goods to small packages, our on-demand vehicles offer seamless, cost-effective, and reliable transport solutions. Choose from mini trucks, tempos, EVs, and two-wheelers to transport goods effortlessly across the city—anytime, anywhere.

- Porter Enterprise: A complete logistics partner for businesses, offering smart solutions for bulk transportation, distribution, and supply chain management.

- Porter Packers & Movers: Professional packing and moving services designed for hassle-free relocation of homes.

- Porter Intercity Courier Services: Reliable and timely parcel delivery via (surface or air) to 19000+ pin codes, catering to both individuals and businesses with a focus on speed and security

If reliability and ease aren't enough, here are several more reasons to choose Porter’s comprehensive services:

- Effortless and Reliable Logistics Solutions: Seamlessly manage all your transportation needs with Porter’s trusted services.
- Extensive Fleet of Options: Choose from a wide range of vehicles, tailored for both personal and business logistics.
- Diverse Vehicle Selection: From two-wheelers to trucks, we have the perfect vehicle for every requirement.
- Transparent Pricing: Know exactly what you're paying for with clear & upfront costs.
- Dedicated Customer Support: Our friendly and responsive team is always here to assist, ensuring a smooth experience from start to finish.
- Expansive City Coverage: Through the Porter Courier Services (via surface or air), we provide reliable and timely parcel delivery to 19000+ pin codes, catering to both individuals and businesses with a focus on speed and security

Choose Porter for a smarter, hassle-free logistics experience!

Easy, trustworthy and reliable Porter is now just a click away. 

- Download the Porter app
- Sign in with your credentials
- Select the service you need
- Enter your pickup and drop-off locations
- Add multiple stops, if necessary
- Book your service and let Porter transport your goods!

Porter makes logistics simple, with efficient and reliable deliveries, transparent pricing, and a seamless experience, every time. Delivery Hai? Ho Jayega.

Download Porter now!

Welcome to Rajmargyatra, the official, all-in-one app from the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI). Drive smarter with a unified platform that puts essential highway services right at your fingertips.
Introducing the National Highway Annual Pass! For a one-time fee of ₹3000, get 200 toll-free crossings on National Highways and National Expressways, valid for one year. Purchase, track your usage, and manage your pass directly in NHAI’s official app.
Key Features:
- Annual Pass Management: Your complete portal to buy, view, and renew the Annual Pass. Track your remaining toll trips and validity with a clean, simple dashboard. Find out all Eligible Toll Plazas from NHAI’s official app.
- Report & Track Issues: Lodge and track complaints about road conditions, toll operations, or facilities.
- Available in Your Language: Use the app in English, Hindi, and over 13 other regional languages for a truly native and comfortable experience.
- FASTag & Toll Services: Check your FASTag status, recharge your wallet, and manage your Monthly Pass all in one place.
- Know Your Highway: Access detailed information for any National Highway toll plaza, including rates, operator details, and amenities.
- Revamped Route Planner (EnRoute): Plan your journey and see all tolls on your route—including National, State, and private plazas. Get precise cost estimates and instantly see how much you save with the Annual Pass.
- 24x7 Emergency Support: Get immediate assistance by calling the 1033 National Highway Helpline directly from the app.

Rajmargyatra is an official initiative by NHAI & IHMCL, designed to be your most trusted partner on the road. Download now for a safer, more efficient, and inclusive highway experience.

developer: Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation Limited
description:
OFFICIAL iOS MOBILE APP by IRCTC (Indian Railway Catering And Tourism Corporation Limited)

IRCTC Train ticketing now made simpler just by SWIPE and SHUFFLE, SELECT and BOOK. Install and preview the "IRCTC RAIL CONNECT" iOS app and book a railway ticket anywhere in India at your fingertips.

Preview the latest features in addition to existing train ticketing services:
:: New users register and activate from App directly.
:: Advanced security features of self-assigned PIN to login without entering username and password on each login.
:: Dashboard with Integrated Menu Bar
:: Seamless Account & Transaction Management
:: Enquire without login for trains, routes and seat availability.
:: Train Search, Train Route and Train Seat Availability Enquiries.
:: Any PNR Enquiry facility to check the PNR reservation status.
:: Check PNR Confirmation Chances Probability before and after booking train tickets for waitlisted availability/tickets.
:: Supports Ladies, Tatkal, Premium Tatkal, Divyangjan and Lower Berth/Sr. Citizen in addition to General Quota train tickets.
:: Accredited Press Correspondents & Divyangjan passengers can book Train Tickets at concessional rates through Photo Identity Card issued by Indian Railways.
:: Current reservation train tickets booking facility.
:: Recover your forgotten user Id through Forgot User Id facility.
:: Integrated with IRCTC e-wallet for faster and hassle free transactions.
:: Boarding point change facility.
:: Syncing of IRCTC's Official Web Site (www.irctc.co.in)  and IRCTC Rail Connect Mobile App tickets. Now users can view or cancel train e-tickets booked through official website or IRCTC Rail Connect mobile app and vice-versa.
:: Users can view status of train e-tickets booked through our authorized Online Travel Agents (OTA).
:: Book train tickets through Various Payment Modes like BHIM/UPI, e-Wallets, Net banking, Credit and Debit cards.
:: Vikalp scheme which provides an option to avail confirmed berth / seat in alternate train to the wait listed passengers.
:: Last Transaction Details to know the status of last transaction of current day as soon as user logs in.
:: Aadhaar Linking facility through mobile app to avail up to 12 train tickets booking in a month.

Give early feedback: Let us know what you think and help improvements in IRCTC Rail Connect iOS App.

Enjoy the never before experience of online train ticketing with all new IRCTC Rail Connect Mobile App on iOS.

Registered Office / Corporate Office:
Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation Ltd.,
4th Floor, Tower-D, World Trade Centre,
Nauroji Nagar, New Delhi-110029

Introducing Digi Yatra 4.0
Where we strive to provide you with an exceptional digital travel experience. In this latest update, we've listened to your feedback and made significant improvements to ensure our app meets your expectations. 
We genuinely appreciate your support and value your feedback. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for future updates, please don't hesitate to contact our dedicated support team. Together, we'll continue to shape Digi Yatra into the ultimate companion for your digital travel needs.
Thank you for choosing Digi Yatra and being a part of our journey towards excellence!

Your super travel app to fulfil all your travel needs and requirements!

The MakeMyTrip travel booking app caters to world travellers and is the perfect place to book hotels, flight tickets, buses, hourly rooms, cabs, train tickets, visa, etc. Download the travel app and be ready to enhance your holiday experience.

redBus is the go-to app for booking online bus tickets, ferry, shuttle, train, and activity packages. Over 36 million users trust us, 400k+ routes worldwide and 3500+ bus operators; we've got you covered no matter where you're going.


Official travel app for booking:

● Bus tickets in India, Indonesia, Vietnam, Cambodia, Peru, Colombia, Malaysia and Singapore
● Ferry tickets and activity packages in Malaysia and Singapore
● Shuttle tickets in Indonesia and limousines in Vietnam
● And IRCTC Authorized Partner App for booking train tickets in India


Benefits of booking online bus tickets with redBus:

● Seat of Your Choice
● Deep Cleaned Buses
● 4.6 Rating (Top-rated)
● Lightening Fast Refund
● Live Bus Location Tracking
● Safe and Secure Payments
● 200k+ Seats Booked Everyday
● 24/7 Hassle-free Customer Support
● FlexiTicket - Reschedule Bus for Free
● Offers Sleeper, Seater, Semi-Sleeper, AC Volvo, Non-AC Intercity Buses
● Multiple Payment Options: Card, UPI, PagoEfectivo (Peru), PSE (Colombia) & more
● Primo Certified Buses: Specially curated high-rated buses with best-in-class experience, i.e. 4+ Rated Buses, Friendly Staff, & On-time!

You can buy a bus ticket with redBus and save money compared to buying at a ticket counter or terminal. In addition, you can enjoy various savings such as redDeal discounts, promo codes, and more.


Steps to Book Bus Tickets on redBus App:

● Enter source, destination, and travel date
● Choose from the available bus services
● Use any of the filters like bus types (Volvo AC Bus / Sleeper / Semi-sleeper), prices, ratings, etc., to find the best bus
● Select a seat of your choice
● Select boarding and dropping points
● Add passenger details and proceed to pay
● Complete payment, & voila! You have successfully booked your bus ticket 
● Get booking confirmation via email/text


In India, redBus is the official partner and has the largest bus listing of APSRTC live track Garuda Buses, Indra Volvo buses of TSRTC, Parivahan buses of Himachal roadways (HRTC), UPSRTC Janrat Shatabdi buses, GSRTC Gurjarnagari buses, Kerala RTC (KSRTC), PRTC, RSRTC buses and popular private buses of Chalo Bus, Flixbus, Zingbus, VRL Travels, NueGo, Chartered Bus, Orange Travels, Apni Bus, Laxmi Holidays, Jabbar Travels, IntrCity SmartBus, SRS Travels for booking seater, semi-sleeper, sleeper, and Volvo AC bus tickets across all available routes i.e. Bangalore to Chennai, Hyderabad to Bangalore, Chennai to Coimbatore, Delhi to Manali, Indore to Bhopal, Delhi to Jaipur Bus and many more.

And for our international travellers, we've also covered you with popular routes. For example, in South East Asia, some popular routes are Singapore to Kuala Lumpur, Kuala Lumpur to Singapore, Singapore to Malacca, Singapore to Ipoh, Kuala Lumpur to Ipoh, Bandung to Bekasi, and Surabaya to Jakarta.
And finally, in Latin America, common routes include Lima to Trujillo, Lima to Chiclayo, Bogota to Medellin, Bogota to Cali, Bogota to Santa Marta, and Bogota to Villavicencio.

We're proud to partner with some of the most popular bus operators in Southeast Asia and Latin America. Our partners in Malaysia and Singapore are Sani Express, Transnational, StarMart, Mayang Sari and more. In Indonesia, we have Daytrans, Baraya, Sinar Jaya, Pasteur Trans, Jackal Holidays, Bhinekka, Cititrans, Damri, and many more.

At redBus, we also make booking ferry tickets easy across Southeast Asia. Tickets for popular routes like Mersing to Tioman and Tanjung Gemok to Tioman are just a click away. With operators like Sindo Ferry, Seven Seas, and Bluewater Ferry, you're sure to find the perfect ride.

Moreover, with our bus pass, you can get a 20% discount on every ride. And if you need to cancel your journey, we offer a full refund guarantee. You can easily download your past bookings and reschedule straight from the app.

Common misspells: red bus, rebus, redbud, redbuss, red bas

We are excited to hear from you. For any queries or concerns, please reach us.

UTS is an Indian Railways official iOS mobile ticketing application which allows the daily train travellers to book unreserved tickets of Indian Railways using their Smartphone. The application is designed in such a way that it is easy to use and has user friendly interface with features like book ticket, cancel ticket, maintain their profile, manage frequent travel routes , etc.The passenger will use Railway wallet to book the ticket.
There are two modes for booking Tickets : (i) Paper (ii) Paperless. In case of paper ticket user has to take a printout from kiosk/counter at concerned station. Whereas in case of Paperless ticket user's Location will be captured to determine he/she is present in valid ticketing area. In this mode no printout is required and the user can directly show his ticket from his smartphone to the TTE. Moreover an alternative to location check has also been introduced in limited stations where a user can scan a unique barcode present at station premises to book his paperless ticket.

Train Info : Live Status is your ultimate companion for Indian Railway travel, designed to provide accurate, real-time information on train schedules, running status, and station details. Whether you're a daily commuter or planning a long-distance journey, Train Info : Live Status ensures you have all the information you need for a smooth and hassle-free experience.

Key Features:
• PNR Status: Enter your PNR number to get instant updates on your ticket status, including confirmation and waiting list status.
• Train Schedules: Access detailed schedules for all Indian Railways trains. Plan your journey with accurate departure and arrival times.
• Station Information: Find comprehensive details about any railway station, including facilities, platform numbers, and nearby amenities.
• Offline Access: Save train schedules and station details for offline access, ensuring you have information even without an internet connection.
• User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a seamless and intuitive user experience with our easy-to-navigate app design.

What Makes Us Different?
• Precision and Reliability: Train Info: Live Status offers the most accurate and up-to-date information. Our advanced algorithms ensure real-time data accuracy, making us more reliable than other train apps.
• User-Centric Design: Our app is designed with the user in mind, featuring an intuitive interface and easy-to-navigate features that set us apart from the competition. Whether you’re tech-savvy or not, you’ll find our app incredibly easy to use.
• Comprehensive Features: Unlike other apps that may focus on one or two aspects, Train Info: Live Status provides a holistic approach to railway travel. From live train status and PNR updates to seat availability and fare enquiries, we cover all your needs in one app.
• Offline Access: We understand the importance of having information at your fingertips, even without internet connectivity. Train Info: Live Status allows you to save schedules and station details for offline access, a feature not commonly found in other apps.
• Regular Updates: Our team is dedicated to continuously improving the app. We regularly update Train Info: Live Status with new features and enhancements based on user feedback, ensuring it remains the best tool for railway travel.
• Personalized Experience: Train Info: Live Status offers personalized notifications and alerts tailored to your specific journeys. Stay informed about delays, platform changes, and more with our customizable notification settings.

Disclaimer : This app relies on public information available on third party websites. This app is not affiliated to Indian Railways at all.

Privacy Policy : https://trainkart.com/privacy-policy

Terms of use : https://trainkart.com/terms

#1 IRCTC Authorised Train Ticket Booking App

ixigo is an all-in-one train app for iPhone. Trusted & loved by travellers, the ixigo Trains app is one of the highest-rated Indian Railways apps for train booking.

Use the ixigo Trains app to check IRCTC PNR status, train running status (where is my train), train routes, seat availability, seat maps, set station alarms and reminders, make an IRCTC train enquiry, order food in train, and more. Trust ixigo to get reliable information on trains between stations, train delays, platform numbers, and live train timetables directly from IRCTC and NTES.

Why is ixigo the best train booking app for Indian Railways?

● Confirmed Ticket or 3X Refund* with 'Alternate Travel Plan'
● Top Rated Train Booking App on App Store - 4.7 Ratings by 6 Lakh+ Users
● Free cancellation & Instant Full Refunds with 'Assured'
● Pay ₹0 Cancellation Charges
● PNR Status & Waitlist Prediction
● Where Is My Train Running Status - works without Internet
● IRCTC Authorised Partner

ixigo's Alternate Travel Plan (formerly known as Travel Guarantee)

● Get 3X Refund* if your waitlisted ticket is not confirmed.
● You will receive your ticket fare refund via your original payment method and the remaining amount as a coupon.
● You can use the coupon to book flights, trains, or buses.

*T&C apply: Refund is based on the selected travel mode (3X for flight, 3X for bus, or 2X for train) if your ticket remains waitlisted.

FREE CANCELLATION & INSTANT FULL REFUNDS with ASSURED
● Get 100% instant refunds on IRCTC train ticket cancellation
● Pay ₹0 PG & service charges during train booking modification
● Free cancellation & refunds also applicable on Tatkal ticket bookings

ixigo's SAME TRAIN ALTERNATES:

● Get confirmed seats on the same train for waitlisted tickets
● Alternate options for your train route

BOOK TRAIN TICKETS

● Use your IRCTC login credentials for easy booking
● Enjoy ₹0 Payment Gateway fees on UPI
● No need to visit the IRCTC website, Rail Connect or RailOne app
● Save traveller information for fast train ticket booking
● Store your rail ticket as an Apple Wallet pass to get trip alerts without the Internet

PNR STATUS & WAITLIST PREDICTION

● Check PNR status to know whether your Indian Railways seat is confirmed or not
● Automated PNR confirmation updates & waitlist PNR predictions
● Know the chances of ticket confirmation, before & after your booking

LIVE TRAIN RUNNING STATUS - WHERE IS MY TRAIN?

● Check live train running status for over 5000+ Indian Railways trains via NTES
● Receive train status alerts like rescheduled, cancelled, delayed, or diverted trains
● Know your train’s location in real-time, without Internet, with offline running status
● Get live station updates via NTES for trains arriving/departing in the next 8 hours

IRCTC TRAIN SEAT AVAILABILITY

● Check train ticket availability for the next 2 months for bookings
● Search for train seat availability by simply typing the name of the railway stations or cities

OTHER FEATURES

● Check seat map, coach position & platform number
● Save popular train routes for offline use
● Add your PNR to know upcoming trip timings & running status
● Order food on train using 500+ IRCTC partner restaurants, powered by Zoop
● Share PNR, train status, running status, seat availability, etc.
● You can also book flights, hotels and buses with great deals.

Major trains operated by Indian Railways covered: Vande Bharat Express, Tejas Express, Rajdhani Express, Shatabdi Express, Duronto Express, Garib Rath, Humsafar Express, Sampark Kranti, etc.

Rated top train app in Mumbai, Delhi, Gurgaon, Noida, Bangalore, Pune, Chennai, Jaipur, Hyderabad, Patna, Hyderabad, Chandigarh, Ahmedabad, Kolkata, Madurai, and other cities in India.

Commonly misspelled terms: irtc, itctc, irtct, where is my trian, exigo, ixico, ixgio, ixgo, ixico, ixigi, ixigio, ixigp, ixingo, ixio, railone

Driving somewhere?
Share your ride and start saving on travel costs!
• Publish your next ride in just minutes: it’s easy and fast
• Decide who goes with you: review passengers’ profiles and ratings to know who you’re travelling with.
• Enjoy the ride: that’s how easy it is to start saving on travel costs!

Book, meet and travel at low prices no matter where you’re going.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
TELL US WHAT YOU THINK: https://www.blablacar.co.uk/contact

Train Ticket Booking App
IRCTC Authorised Partner
Highest Rated Train App in India

Why is ConfirmTkt the best app for IRCTC train ticket booking?

IRCTC Bookings with Easy IRCTC Login

● Get Confirmed Train Tickets with Waitlist Prediction and the Same Train Alternates feature.
● You can easily use your existing IRCTC login credentials for train ticket booking on the ConfirmTkt train app.
● Full refund on IRCTC ticket cancellation.
● Alternates feature that combines train and train, bus and train to give you a confirmed ticket to travel.
● Recover forgotten IRCTC or register a new IRCTC user id easily. Reset the IRCTC password in the app.
● Supports General Quota, Ladies, Tatkal, Lower Berth/Sr. Citizen quotas.
● IRCTC Vikalp Option available to help you get Confirm Train Ticket.
● 24x7 customer support; for any IRCTC train booking & enquiry related queries, call 08068243910.

PNR Status & Waitlist Predictions of Train Tickets

You can check the PNR Status of your IRCTC train ticket on the ConfirmTkt app. In addition, you can get instant notifications of any changes in PNR status and your train timings or route. If your ticket is on the waitlist, you can also see the prediction of getting your train ticket confirmed. Also, you can check for any hidden confirm tickets through ConfirmTkt same train alternates.

Train Booking Recommendation: We highly recommend you prepare for alternatives if the ConfirmTkt prediction of your train ticket is a low chance and you cannot find any confirmed ticket through ConfirmTkt's same train alternate feature.

You can also book flights and buses on ConfirmTkt & get great deals. You can also book hotels from a wide range of options available on the app.

IRCTC Live Train Running Status

After booking IRCTC train tickets on the ConfirmTkt app, you can quickly check your train running status and get live updates of your train. So you can plan a smooth train journey with the ConfirmTkt train app.

Some of the frequently asked queries that we get from our train ticket booking users:

1. How ConfirmTkt increases your chance of getting a confirmed train ticket?

With ConfirmTkt same train alternates, you can find hidden confirm train tickets by changing your boarding/dropping point. With ConfirmTkt's accurate prediction, even if the ticket is on the waitlist, your ticket will get confirmed if the ConfirmTkt forecast is green, so go ahead and book your train ticket with assurance.

2. Does ConfirmTkt Guarantee Confirm Train Ticket?
No, ConfirmTkt does not guarantee you a confirmed train ticket. But instead, it increases your chance of getting a confirmed train ticket powered by the same train alternates and prediction.

3. How many days in advance can a train ticket be booked for any route?
Train tickets can be booked 60 days in advance on the ConfirmTkt app.

We are the official train ticketing partner of the Royal Challengers Bengaluru. Also, we are a principal service provider for IRCTC, and IRCTC has its app as IRCTC Rail Connect. Indian Railways has also launched its SuperApp named ‘RailOne’ recently.

Note: IRCTC is often misspelt as irtc, itctc, or irtct. IRCTC : Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation

For queries/feedback on IRCTC train ticket booking: support@confirmtkt.com

RailOne: Your All-in-One App by Indian Railways
RailOne is a comprehensive app developed by Indian Railways, designed to consolidate all public-facing services into a single, user-friendly platform. By integrating multiple functionalities into one app, RailOne simplifies the travel experience with a seamless single sign-on (SSO) system. Whether you’re planning a trip, booking tickets, or seeking additional services during your journey, RailOne is your ultimate travel companion. 

Key Features:
Plan and Book Tickets: Effortlessly plan journeys, search for trains, and book reserved or unreserved tickets through the app. This consolidation reduces the need for multiple platforms, streamlining the booking process.
- My- Bookings: This functionality enables the users to check the details and history information of both booked and canceled tickets (unreserved and reserved) at the same platform. User interface presents the filtering  functionality as per user’s preference based on duration and transaction type.
-You: This functionality enables users to view profile details and edit if needed. Also shows status of profile completion. Gives access for changing password, enabling/disabling biometric. Users can also verify email, edit their name (can be done only once) and delete account. These options are available under My Account Tab. User can also Add money to his R-wallet.
Real-time Train Tracking: Track your train in real-time with live updates on delays, expected arrival times, and other critical information, keeping you informed and helping you adjust your plans.

Coach Position Finder: Locate your coach’s position on the platform easily, making the boarding process smoother and more convenient.

Order Food on the Go: Place food orders from partner vendors while on board, ensuring fresh and timely meals during your journey.

Rail Madad: Use the Rail Madad feature to raise and track complaints or feedback directly with Indian Railways for quick resolution.

Refund Requests: Simplify the process of requesting refunds for canceled or missed journeys through the app.

Multilingual Support: Access the app in multiple languages, catering to India’s diverse population and enhancing accessibility.

R-Wallet Integration: Utilize R-Wallet, a digital wallet integrated into the app, for secure and convenient payments for various services.

The app is developed by CRIS (Centre for Railway Information Systems), an organization under the Ministry of Railways. CRIS combines skilled IT professionals with experienced railway personnel to design, develop, and maintain critical software systems for Indian Railways. Key systems developed by CRIS include:

Reserved Ticketing System: Efficiently manages millions of long-distance seat bookings.
Unreserved Ticketing System: Facilitates easy ticketing for short-distance journeys.
Train Search and Tracking: Offers real-time train search and tracking features.
Coach Position Finder: Enhances the boarding process by helping passengers find their coach.
Rail Madad: Manages grievances and feedback effectively.
Food Ordering System: Allows passengers to order food from partner vendors.
Refund Systems: Processes refunds smoothly for booking errors and cancellations.
CRIS continues to lead in innovation, developing integrated solutions that make travel more efficient. The partnership between CRIS and Indian Railways has been instrumental in modernizing railway infrastructure and enhancing passenger services through advanced technology. RailOne embodies this digital evolution, making train travel smarter, more comfortable, and more accessible. With ongoing developments in RailOne and CRIS’s IT systems, Indian Railways aims to provide an exceptional travel experience, leveraging technology to simplify every aspect of your journey.

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday.
